EmailTemplate.subject: Partner Newsletter — BigCommerce Community, Stencil, and more
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
BigCommerce is excited to launch a new and improved Community for merchants and partners. With these updates, we’ll make it easier to find the answers, resources and connections needed to help businesses grow. May 2016 Newsletter Introducing the New BigCommerce Community
BigCommerce is excited to launch a new and improved Community <[[http://forum.bigcommerce.com/]]> for merchants and partners. With these updates, we’ll make it easier to find the answers, resources and connections needed to help businesses grow. BigCommerce partners will now be able to register, log in, interact and offer services and support to merchants like never before. Introduce yourself to our merchants online by logging in, completing your profile and starting a discussion. Get Started Now <[[http://forum.bigcommerce.com/]]> Announcement — BigCommerce raises $30 million in round of funding BigCommerce has raised a $30 million round of funding led by GGV Capital <[[http://www.ggvc.com/]]>, a San Francisco-based investment firm that has also invested in innovative companies including Airbnb, Alibaba, Houzz, Pandora, Slack, Square and Zendesk. With this funding, managing partner at GGV Capital Jeff Richards joins the BigCommerce board. The round also included participation from all existing investors, including Stephan Schambach, founder and former chairman of Demandware.
“This new financing follows on the successful launch of several new products, our partnerships with major players in ecommerce like eBay and Square, and our successful expansion into the midmarket,” Brent Bellm, CEO of BigCommerce said. Read the Announcement <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/press/releases/]]> Coming Soon — New partnership tiers, partner training, and more As your partner, we’re here to help your business grow and succeed. In Q3, we’re introducing enhancements to the partner program that will improve the way you’re trained and the way you’re paid for referrals.
What’s changing? We’re introducing a new, tiered ecosystem, allowing you to make bigger commissions as you sell more and grow your BigCommerce practice. We’re also launching training classes that will help you sell more effectively and will be required for advancing in the Partner Program. Finally, we’re aligning marketing support and resources to help you grow your business.
Over the next couple of months, we’ll be sending out more specifics, so watch your email for more details. Announcing Pinterest Buyable Pins to help customers sell more We’re thrilled to introduce Pinterest Buyable Pins, a convenient feature that will help your customers sell even more on social media. Buyable Pins let Pinterest users find merchants’ products, learn more about them, and purchase them — all without ever leaving the Pinterest app. Buyable Pins <[[https://business.pinterest.com/en/buyable-pins]]> are just like regular pins, but feature a blue “Buy it” button, which enables Pinterest users to purchase merchants’ products directly through the Pinterest app. It’s a sleek, intuitive, and fast checkout experience that we know your customers (and theirs) will love. Read Now <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Selling-on-Pinterest]]> Introducing new enhancements to our Shipping API You asked for it, and we’re delivering. BigCommerce will now auto-detect the shipping provider for your customers’ orders based on the associated tracking number. This important feature upgrade will improve the end customer experience and ensure a clickable tracking link is provided. You do not need to make any changes to make use of this feature -- it will automatically roll out to all stores that have utilized the Order Shipments API endpoint. Read More on the Order Shipments API <[[https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api/stores/v2/orders/shipments]]> What’s new with Stencil? We’re happy to announce you now have the ability to automatically upload your custom theme. For more information, see the technical documentation. Read more <[[https://stencil.bigcommerce.com/docs/bundling-and-submitting-a-theme]]>.
In addition, we are proud to release 16 additional theme variations designed to help businesses like you fully express the power of your brand. Key additions include eight long-awaited theme variations that feature a sidebar navigation, in addition to four theme variations for larger catalog sizes.
Stay tuned for more Stencil news in the near future! See All Stencil Themes <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/The-Bigcommerce-Themes-Marketplace?q=stencil&l=en_US&fs=Search&pn=1]]> Other product updates, new apps, and promotions
Add targeted product recommendations to your clients’ stores with LimeSpot
Did you know that incorporating product recommendations into your clients’ sites can help them get more pageviews per user and up to 40% more traffic and sales? LimeSpot seamlessly integrates with BigCommerce stores to cross-sell and upsell by suggesting products related to each visitor’s behavior and profile, as well as products that are trending, popular or featured, or have been recently viewed. Read More <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/apps/limespot-personalization-product-recommendation/]]> Incorporate LiveEngage Chat into merchants’ sites for 20% Off When it comes to ecommerce, the right touch at the right time is critical for building customer relationships and driving business leads. LivePerson’s chat solution is powered by live data so you can identify high-value customers, or those about to abandon their cart, and engage with them when it matters most -- saving up your precious resources for customers who are really in need. On average, LiveEngage users see a 20% increase in conversions and a 35% increase average order value. For a limited time, BigCommerce community members can add LiveEngage to their website at 20% off! Get Started <[[https://www.bigcommerce.com/apps/liveperson-livechat-messaging/]]>
